```{r}
#create two matrices#
A=matrix(1:100, nrow=10)
B=matrix(1:1000, nrow=10)
```


```{r}
#check if matrices are square#
dim(A)
dim(B)

#compute determinants
det(A)
det(B)

#inverse Matrix#
solve(A)
solve(B)
```


```{r}
#create new matrix#
S=matrix(2:5, nrow=2)

#check if new matrix is square#
dim(S)

#compute determinants for new matrix#
det(S)

#calculate inverse of new matrix#
S1 <- solve(S)

round(S1%*%S, 10)
```
